strings.meteoSwissExposureLabel: Estimated people exposed to windspeed above {windspeed}m/s. ({saffirSimpsonScale})
strings.meteoSwissEstimatesNote: These impact estimates are derived from a model and come with very high uncertainty. More information will be added soon.
strings.meteoSwissEventDescription: {model} has forecasted a tropical cyclone on {updatedAt}. The tropical cyclone named {eventName} is forecasted to impact {countryName} from {eventDate}.
strings.meteoSwissAuthoritativeMessage: Please also consider {link} and classification of {classificationLink}.
strings.tropicalStormDescription: equivalent to tropical storm or above
strings.categoryOneDescription: equivalent to a category 1 hurricane or above
strings.categoryTwoDescription: equivalent to a category 2 hurricane or above
strings.categoryThreeDescription: equivalent to a category 3 hurricane or above
strings.categoryFourDescription: equivalent to a category 4 hurricane or above
strings.categoryFiveDescription: equivalent to a category 5 hurricane or above
